content: **crocheted jacket in drops muskat the piece is worked top down with lace pattern stripes and split in sides sizes s xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-812 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-450-500-550-600 g colour 83 pearl 100-150-150-150-150-150 g colour 76 light denim **buttons** drops buttons no 522 1 item in all sizes **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 17 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
